Nemours is seeking a fifth Child Neurologist to join our team. This is a full-time, employed position based at a partner hospital site in Lakeland, Florida. Physician candidates must be eligible for unrestricted Florida license, have completed a Pediatric Neurology fellowship, and be board-certified or board-eligible in Pediatric Neurology. Call will be for pediatric neurology service only with no adult call. There are opportunities to develop epilepsy, headache or other programmatic interests.…
